net.varkhan.base.management.monitor.primitive
Interface MonitorLong

All Superinterfaces:
Monitor<java.lang.Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MonitorCounter, MonitorMilliTime, MonitorNanoTime, MonitorTime, MonitorTimer
public interface MonitorLong
extends Monitor<java.lang.Long>

A monitored integer value.

A integer value that reflects the state of a monitored process or resource.
